pages.text: Nuclear Waste is a waste product produced by the $(l:multiblocks/fission)Fission Reactor$(/l). It can later be used to produce $(l:item/pellet_polonium)Polonium Pellets$(/l) and $(l:item/pellet_plutonium)Plutonium Pellets$(/l). $(p)Spent Nuclear Waste is radioactive, hence they must be stored inside a radiotactive waste barrel and cannot be transported via a $(l:misc_blocks/quantum_entangloporter)Quantum Entangloporter$(/l).
